code: import React from'react';import'./TableBody.css';import UsersIcons from'../UsersIcons';import{jsx as _jsx}from"react/jsx-runtime";import{jsxs as _jsxs}from"react/jsx-runtime";const TableBody=_ref=>{let{rows,onClick,isNewTaskFieldPresent,newTaskField}=_ref;return/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("tbody",{className:"body",children:rows.map(row=>{if(row.field&&isNewTaskFieldPresent){return/*#__PURE__*/_jsxs(React.Fragment,{children:[/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("tr",{children:/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("td",{colSpan:"5",children:newTaskField})}),/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("tr",{onClick:()=>onClick(row),children:/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("td",{children:row.field})},row.id)]},row.id);}return/*#__PURE__*/_jsxs("tr",{onClick:()=>onClick(row),children:[/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("td",{children:row.title}),/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("td",{children:row.createdAt}),/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("td",{children:row.finishedAt}),/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("td",{children:/*#__PURE__*/_jsx(UsersIcons,{owners:row.owners})}),/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("td",{children:row.priority})]},row.id);})});};export default TableBody;
